coded_answer.p: I have just received the letter from you and I'm writtingwriting to you as soon as posiblepossible. I can promise to you that I'll do my best to help you. You told me that you are the leader of a group of students this year, because Mr. Brown is ill. Poor Mr. Brown,. I hope he will get better soon.

As I've just checked and the group has been booked into The Palace Hotel. The best way to get from there to the conference is by coachecoach, thatwhich I have arranged for you. The driver, Mr. Olsson, works for us since. He will pick you up at 11 oo11:00 a.m. The conference is from 12 oo12:00 to 2 oo2:00 p.m. At the end of the conference there is a party from 2 oo2:00 to 3 oo3:00. I suggest you to wearwear comfortable and nice clothes because I have planedplanned a sightseeing tour for you before. Before you catch your plane at 8 oo8:00 p.m. I'd like to show you a museum, a gallery and the gardens that are belongingbelong to the palace. Then we can have a rest in the caffeecafe and talk before your flight home. I think I gavehave given you all the importenimportant informationsinformation. I hope to see you all soon,.

NowdaysNowadays motorization is one of the most important inventions. AsWhen you look amoungamongaround everybody has a car or motorcycle. No matter that people started worredworried more about polutionpollution in the world.

Let me to tell you, how the invention of the motorcycle has affected my life. I love motocyclesmotorcycles and I don't think I could live without them. I driveridehave ridden a motocyclemotorcycle since I was 16 yearyears old. Me and my brother we used to go to the rock concerts. We have metmet a lot of people there samewho were as mad about motorcyclemotorcycles as we were. We were avengingorganizedorganized races and trips. We were drivingridingrode motocyclesmotorcycles for a few daydays befourbefore we finally had gotgot to our mittingmeeting points.

I really enjoy drivingriding my motocyclemotorcycle. People say that it is dangerous,; I don't think so. When I driveride it is only me and my motocyclemotorcycle. BeforeIn front of me and afterbehind are my friends, thatwho I like and trust. And around me is the naturecountryside, thatwhich I can watch and enjoy while we shoplook forefor a camp. We can go to any place we like, avoidavoiding traffic and to fullcrowded buses, and trains, etc.

I am really greatfulgrateful forto the people who invented the first motocyclemotorcycle in the world. I feel very bad about the fact that I don't know who was itit was. On the other hand no matter that I feel very good about that because that invention has changed and affected my life endand the people I care about,; it has affected my life in athe very best way.
